text: Chappaquiddick is a place in Massachusetts, in the United States. It became famous because of a fatal car accident involving Edward Kennedy in 1969. == Other websites == * Martha's Vineyard Vacation Tips * Chappy Ferry website * Chappaquiddick Wampanoag * Mytoi Gardens * Wasque Reservation Category:Islands of the United States category:Geography of Massachusetts
title: Chappaquiddick Island
